snippet: After more than five years, revelations of sealed documents and other materials promise to expand the scope of the phone-hacking case surrounding Rupert Murdoch’s British newspapers.
lead_paragraph: After more than five years, revelations of sealed documents and other materials promise to expand the scope of the phone-hacking case surrounding Rupert Murdoch’s British newspapers.

headline.seo: New Details Deepen British Phone Hacking Scandal
headline.main: New Details Emerge in Report on Murdoch Papers
headline.print_headline: New Details Emerge in Report on Murdoch Papers
